name: sqlite_escape_string
purpose: Escapes a string for use as a query parameter

return.description: Returns an escaped string for use in an SQLite SQL statement.

notes.description:
Do not use this function to encode the return values from UDF's created
    using sqlite_create_function or
    sqlite_create_aggregate - use
    sqlite_udf_encode_binary instead.

addslashes should NOT be used to
    quote your strings for SQLite queries; it will lead to strange results
    when retrieving your data.
